input: Further, Verisign's six-year contracts have a presumptive right of renewal, meaning that they instantly renew as long as the company provides largely uninterrupted service, which the company had, in fact, maintained for 23 years and counting. input: However, in November 2020, McDonald's indicated that its plant-based burger (which was developed in partnership with Beyond Meat and is still in the test phase) will not carry the Beyond brand, but instead will be branded as the McPlant burger. This allows the burger to carry a uniform brand globally, even in McDonald's international licensed markets, where patties may be supplied by companies other than Beyond Meat.
